Row.sql: ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public."AlertHistory" ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS "Alarm2" character varying;
SELECT MAX(time) as end, MIN(time) as start FROM public."value_stream" where property_name='Main_Program' and property_value=[[propValue]] and time>=startdate and time<=enddate

SELECT count(case when "Name" = 'BH730' then "Name" end) as BH730, count(case when "Name" = 'MV120' then "Name" end) as MV120, count(case when "Name" = 'MV130' then "Name" end) as MV130, to_char("Regist_Date", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as RegistDate FROM public."AlertHistory" WHERE "Regist_Date" BETWEEN [[startdate]] AND [[enddate]] group by RegistDate;
SELECT * FROM public."AlertHistory" WHERE "Regist_Date" BETWEEN [[startdate]] AND [[enddate]];

SELECT "Main_Program", SUM("Operation_Time") AS "Operation_Time", cast(to_char("Regist_Date", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as timestamp) as timestamp FROM public."MainHistory" WHERE "Name" = [[DeviceName]] AND ("Regist_Date" BETWEEN [[startdate]] AND [[enddate]]) GROUP BY "Main_Program", timestamp;
SELECT * FROM public."MainHistory" WHERE "Name" = [[DeviceName]] AND ("Regist_Date" BETWEEN [[startdate]] AND [[enddate]]);
